}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== It has no FCC photos. This dongle may be the DWA-131 rev C1.
[http://wifi.yunos.com/pwifi/down.htm Windows driver]
It seems to only be available for purchase via ''Taobao'' in China.
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:DWA-131CT.No1.JPG File:DWA-131CT.No2.JPG File:DWA-131CT.No3.JPG File:DWA-131CT.VID.jpg File:DWA-131CT.Driver.jpg </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]]
